text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 2000. ==Events== TV celebration 50 years in Brazil, Rede Globo has 35 years. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ===1990s=== *Malhação (1995–present) *Cocoricó (1996–present) ==Ending this year== Rede Globo started on glasses from season 2000–2001. ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *2000 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 2000
title: 2000 in Brazilian television
